Opera For Linux Goes Beta

18 Aug 1999

There's a nice little interview over at LinuxToday with Jon von Tetzchner from Opera Software about the upcoming release of the Opera browser to the Linux OS. Nothing too exciting, but there are some cool screenshots to check out.
